sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section class="todoapp">
    <!-- 除了驼峰, 还可以使用-转换链接 -->
    <TodoHeader @addTodoItem="addTodoItem"></TodoHeader>
    <TodoMain :todoList="todoList" @rmTodoItem="rmTodoItem"></TodoMain>
    <TodoFooter></TodoFooter>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
// 1.0 样式引入
import "./style/base.css"
import "./style/index.css"
    
import TodoHeader from "./components/TodoHeader";
import TodoMain from "./components/TodoMain";
import TodoFooter from "./components/TodoFooter";


export default {
  components: {
    TodoHeader,
    TodoMain,
    TodoFooter,
  },
  data () {
    return {
      todoList:[
        {id:100,name:"数据结构学习",todoIsDone:true},
        {id:101,name:"计算机网络学习",todoIsDone:false},
        {id:102,name:"操作系统学习",todoIsDone:false},
      ]
    }
  },
  methods: {
    addTodoItem(todoItem){
      //添加任务方法
      //注意 更新数组，和限制空任务输入
      //获取最后一个
      let id = this.todoList.length == 0?100:this.todoList[this.todoList.length-1].id+1;
      console.log(id);
      this.todoList.push({
        id:id,
        name:todoItem,
        todoIsDone:false
      })
      console.log(todoItem)
    },
    rmTodoItem(deId){
      let index = this.todoList.findIndex(obj=>obj.id===deId)
      
    }
  }
};
</script>
